title: Hedonic Prices of Census Tracts in the Boston Area

parameters.nox: annual average nitrogen oxide concentration in parts per hundred million
parameters.zn: proportion of 25,000 square feet residential lots
parameters.age: proportion of owner units built prior to 1940
parameters.blacks: proportion of blacks in the population
parameters.dis: weighted distances to five employment centers in the Boston area
parameters.rad: index of accessibility to radial highways
parameters.lstat: proportion of population that is lower status
parameters.chas: is the tract bounds the Charles River?
